entry.title: MOP UP IS UNDERWAY ON JIM CREEK FIRE NEAR GLIDE
entry.summary: June 28, 2025 6:30 a.m. Mop-up is underway on the Jim Creek Fire, located approximately 9 miles southeast of Glide, near Cavitt Creek Road. Douglas Forest Protective Association Public Information Officer Rachael Pope said hand crews continue to work diligently on the now confirmed 18-acre fire. Pope said mop-up may possibly take several more days....
